content: this mini candy cauldron is just the right size to hold a few small halloween treats it works up fast and is perfect for a little halloween party favor or gift this pattern is written in english using us crochet terms finished size approximately 3 tall and 3 5 in diameter supplies black worsted weight yarn sample made with loops and threads impeccable but any similar yarn will work g crochet hook 4 25 mm stich marker yarn needle scissors *this pattern is available free on my website or an ad free version is available for purchase
